f.string: Trust Territories of the Pacific Islands

div.head: Recommendations for est. of consular office. Now on "No Consul" list.
div.p: Memo 4/2/48 FSP to OFS re establishment of consular post in Trust Territories of Pacific
Memo 4/21/48 OFS to FSP states no need experienced in past for such an office but Counselor of Embassy at Manila being requested to make inspection trip those areas and report to Department.

Memo 5/12/48 from DA-Green circularizing Department with attached draft instruction to Manila requesting Flexer, Counselor of Embassy to stop at Guam on return to USA and gather data re need for office in Trust Territories.
Desp. 294/from Wellington re Mr. Scotten's trip to Samoa and report on political conditions there.
CONF. memo re proposed est. office in 1950 Fiscal Year. States Counselor Flexer of Manila now making trip to survey Trust Territories.
